title: Ep.5  Katy Wix
itunes:title: Ep.5  Katy Wix
itunes:subtitle: Cariad talks to comedian and actor Katy Wix
description:
Cariad talks to comedian and actor Katy Wix, (Not Going Out, Agatha Raisin and The Anna & Katy show) about the death of one of her oldest friends. As ever they talk about grief, the difficulties of losing someone you're not related to and dealing with the pain through medication.You can tweet the show @thegriefcast or email us thegriefcast@gmail.com because you are not alone.x

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
